Articles.Content:
Since resources may be in the game soon, why not start guessing names for them?

Things such as Testium (found in the game files somewhere) or Resourcium.

I doubt that they'll use kethane, however.

(Edit. Wow...misspelled the friggin' thread title...)

this is what we know.

Things have likely changed since that image was posted.

I do not expect resources until .24-.26 area of updates. That's not what I'd consider soon.

this is what we know.

-snip-

Things have likely changed since that image was posted.

I do not expect resources until .24-.26 area of updates. That's not what I'd consider soon.

According to Nova, it did actually change to a point where this isn't relevant anymore. This graph isn't really a good or accurate reference now, it's totally unknown what the current planned system is like :l

According to Nova, it did actually change to a point where this isn't relevant anymore. This graph isn't really a good or accurate reference now, it's totally unknown what the current planned system is like :l

Yeah my guess is that the only things that may make it from that image into what ever the final version of resources is... is the names... maybe. It remains our only reference however inaccurate it has become.
